long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool is part of a student research project, and is only for willing research participants to download; this allows users to screenshot things online and add a short description. They will be able to download all their screenshots/descriptions at any time. The research participants who will receive this are agreeing to record notable things they see online and explain later why they chose to record those things.
